T02D2164:268b-1: n'i l'am bar dha ra badzra p'a ni ma h'a
T02D2164:268b-2: yaksha tsakra ma h'a de ba ga na mandal sto
T02D2164:268b-3: tra n'a ma / bod skad du /
T02D2164:268b-4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo
T02D2164:268b-5: rje gos sngon po can 'khor lo chen po'i lha
T02D2164:268b-6: tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2164:268b-7: dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2164:268b-8: h'um lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog dam pa na //
T02D2164:268b-9: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa'i gtso bo ste //
T02D2164:268b-10: skye med dang las longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02D2164:268b-11: yon tan ma lus rdzogs pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2164:268b-12: sprul pa'i sku mchog gdug pa 'dul mdzad pa //
T02D2164:268b-13: brjid pa'i sku mda' sprul brgyad sku la brgyan //
T02D2164:268b-14: snang srid dbang du sdud pa'i mthu stobs can //
T02D2164:268b-15: srid gsum sdug bsngal mthar mdzad khyod la 'dud //
T02D2164:268b-16: zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum mthing nag 'bar ba'i zhal //
T02D2164:268b-17: g-yas dkar dmar sbyan ni gsum gsum ldan //
T02D2164:268b-18: phyag drug rdo rje g-yas 'chang g-yon sdigs mdzub //
T02D2164:268b-19: bar gnyis thal rdebs mtha' gnyis sbrul gsol 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-0: dpral ba'i khro gnyer smin ma g-yo zhing 'khrug / dbu @269a * //
T02D2164:269a-1: skra kham nag gyen brdzes me stag 'phro //
T02D2164:269a-2: ral pa'i cod pan sprul gyi gdengs kas brgyan //
T02D2164:269a-3: rigs kyi bdag pos dbu brgyan khyod la 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-4: ljags 'dril mche gtsigs nga ros 'phrug sgra sgrogs //
T02D2164:269a-5: kha rlangs me ltar 'bar bas gdug pa bsreg / mche ba gtsigs bas dug gsum rtsad nas gcod //
T02D2164:269a-6: nyon mongs 'joms par mdzad pa khyod la 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-7: 'jig rten gsum slob sku mchog shin tu brjid //
T02D2164:269a-8: sngon po 'chad pa'i na bza' sku la gsol //
T02D2164:269a-9: dus mtha'i ma ltar 'od zer 'bar ba'i sku //
T02D2164:269a-10: srid gsum zil gnon khyad 'phags khyod la 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-11: gsus pa'i smad 'khyil stag gi sham thabs can //
T02D2164:269a-12: tshangs pa brgya byin nyi zla 'bar ba'i steng //
T02D2164:269a-13: zhabs gnyis phrag bzhag yon tan rdzogs pa'i sku //
T02D2164:269a-14: mtha' gnyis rtag chad sel mdzad khyod la 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-15: rngam pa'i sku yis bdud rnams 'dul bar mdzad //
T02D2164:269a-16: brang 'gro brgyad kyis sku brgyan kru dbang 'dul //
T02D2164:269a-17: brkyang bskum brjid pas gnod sbyin zil gyis gnon //
T02D2164:269a-18: phrin las mthar mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-19: sbrul pa'i khro tshogs bye ba sku las 'phro //
T02D2164:269a-20: h'um phat sgra 'byin mtshon cha mang pos 'debs //
T02D2164:269a-21: mthing nag sku yis khams gsum cho nges 'debs //
T02D2164:269a-22: sprul pas skrag mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-23: yum mchog mdzes ldan mthing nag zhal gcig ma //
T02D2164:269a-24: phyag g-yas gri gug gdung dmar zhal du stobs //
T02D2164:269a-25: rus pa'i phreng brgyan bskal pa'i 'od zer 'phro //
T02D2164:269a-26: sprul pa grangs med khro chung 'phro la 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-27: dri za'i rigs 'dul khro rgyal bdud las rgyal //
T02D2164:269a-28: sku yi rang bzhin zhi ba'i las mdzad pa //
T02D2164:269a-29: dkar gsal zhal gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje 'phyar //
T02D2164:269a-30: rtse gsum sdigs mdzub gti mug 'joms la 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-31: brkyang bskum bzhugs nas na bza' sngon po gsol //
T02D2164:269a-32: brang 'gro brgyad kyis sku brgyan mthu stobs can //
T02D2164:269a-33: gsung gi nga ros log 'dren gdug pa 'dul //
T02D2164:269a-34: rngam mdzad bdud las rgyal byed khyed la 'dud //
T02D2164:269a-35: mnyes byed yum ni lha mo 'od zer can //
T02D2164:269a-36: dkar mo 'dzum can zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan //
T02D2164:269b-0: spu gri gtso 'khyud @269b dung dmar yab la stobs //
T02D2164:269b-1: khro chung bye 'gyed lha mo khyod la 'dud //
T02D2164:269b-2: gshin rje 'dul mdzad yon tan rang bzhin sku //
T02D2164:269b-3: rgyas pa'i phrin las mthar phyin sku mdog ser //
T02D2164:269b-4: zhal gcig phyag bzhis bdud 'dul rdo rje 'phyar //
T02D2164:269b-5: dbyug to g-yon 'dzin sdigs mdzub 'khyud khyod 'dud ;
T02D2164:269b-6: / zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon mdzad 'gying //
T02D2164:269b-7: brjid sku na bza' sngon po stag ris gsol //
T02D2164:269b-8: rigs bzhi gdug pas sku brgyan yon tan rgyas //
T02D2164:269b-9: sprul pa'i khro 'gyed gzi brjid 'bar khyod 'dud //
T02D2164:269b-10: dgyes mdzad lha mo dbyangs can gser mdog zhal //
T02D2164:269b-11: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ral gri gtsol 'khyud //
T02D2164:269b-12: bandha khrag bkang yab kyi zhal du stobs //
T02D2164:269b-13: sprul pa grangs med 'gyed mdzad khyod la 'dud //
T02D2164:269b-14: klu dbang 'dul mdzad gsung gi rang bzhin sku //
T02D2164:269b-15: dbang gi phrin las mthar phyin sku mdog dmar //
T02D2164:269b-16: 'gying bag zhabs gnyis brkyang bskums bdag gnon //
T02D2164:269b-17: rngam chen me ltar 'bar ba khyod la 'dud //
T02D2164:269b-18: zhal gcig phyag bzhis rdo rje sprul zhags bsnams //
T02D2164:269b-19: sdigs mdzub 'khyud mdzad gsung gi rngam stabs can //
T02D2164:269b-20: sprul rigs bzhis brgyan gos sngon stag ris gsol //
T02D2164:269b-21: klu rigs dbang sdud rngam sgra sgrogs khyod 'dud //
T02D2164:269b-22: mnyes mdzad lha mo dmar mo mdzum bag can //
T02D2164:269b-23: zhal gcig phyag gnyis te'u gtsol 'khyud //
T02D2164:269b-24: dung dmar stobs mdzad sprul pa'i khro tshogs sprul //
T02D2164:269b-25: thabs mkhas sgra can yum mchog 'khyud la 'dud //
T02D2164:269b-26: gnod sbyin rigs 'dul phrin las rang bzhin sku ;
T02D2164:269b-27: / rtog pa'i phrin las mthar phyin sku mdog ljang //
T02D2164:269b-28: zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mchog phyag mtshan ldan //
T02D2164:269b-29: phrin las bzhi mdzad rdo rje be con 'dzin //
T02D2164:269b-30: sdigs mdzub gnyis mdzad yum la 'khyud khyod 'dud //
T02D2164:269b-31: brkyang bskum mdzad pa rigs bzhi'i sprul gyis brgyan //
T02D2164:269b-32: stod g-yogs sngon po stag ris na bza' gsol //
T02D2164:269b-33: phrin las thams cad rdzogs mdzad mthu stobs can //
T02D2164:269b-34: bgegs rnams 'joms mdzad bdud rtsi 'khyil khyod 'dud //
T02D2164:269b-35: thod gyur ljang gu zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02D2164:269b-36: thabs shes tshul ldan 'khor lo gtso la 'khyud //
T02D2164:270a-2: sprul lnga 'gyed mdzad rlung 'byin sku la 'dud //
T02D2164:270a-3: dza:h'um bam ho:'jigs ston rgyas 'debs ma //
T02D2164:270a-4: bdud dang mu stegs skrag mdzad snying nas 'dren //
T02D2164:270a-5: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu ma //
T02D2164:270a-6: bdud dpung 'joms mdzad sgo ma bzhi la 'dud //
T02D2164:270a-7: rang gi dad pa'i stobs kyis bskul gyur nas //
T02D2164:270a-8: mos pa'i dbang gis bstod pa 'di byas pa'i //
T02D2164:270a-9: bsod nams tshogs gyur sgrib pa gnyis byang nas //
T02D2164:270a-10: rgyud shel ltar dag sems can don byed shog / bstod pa mos ba'i rgyud ngan tha ba btul //
T02D2164:270a-11: ma rig mun sel dag pa zla zer 'dra //
T02D2164:270a-12: dri med gsal ba gang thob sems can rnams //
T02D2164:270a-13: 'khor lo chen po'i lha zhal mthong bar shog /
T02D2164:270a-14: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo
T02D2164:270a-15: rje gos sngon po can 'khor lo chen po'i lha
T02D2164:270a-16: tshogs la bstod pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2164:270a-17: nam gru'i rigs las byung ba dngos grub brnyes pa'i
T02D2164:270a-18: slob dpon dz'a ba ri pas mdzad pa rdzogs so
T02D2164:270a-20: / // / rgya gar gyi pandi ta chen po de ba p'u rnam ti dang /
